txt.en: The clues have led you to a key.\n\nYou should return to the chamber in the Grey Mountains and try it on the door.
The first stone is yours!\n\nYou should retrieve it from the chamber in the Grey Mountains.

The vision shows you a square stone on this pedestal. This first stone must be out there somewhere, waiting for you to find it. You swear you can hear faint whispers, bidding you to look more closely.
Return the stone to its pedestal
An illusion has appeared before you in the Crown Chamber.\n\nYou should inspect the illusion of the first stone.
You hear a distant grinding sound...
You have found one of the missing stones!\n\nYou should return it to its rightful place in the Crown Chamber.
The key fits the lock and opens the door
The missing stone is out there somewhere, waiting to be found.
The missing stone is out there somewhere, waiting to be found.

Inspect the illusion of the first stone
Unlock the door in the chamber
The stones must be returned to their rightful places in the Crown Chamber.
